title: About the upcoming changes to tanks
body: PLEASE, give Elise some love, i really want to use her bloodmoon skin in my ranked games :(

replies.body: I'm just happy we get 25% bonus hp back for junglers and mini sunfire cape to top it off. made me smile
Link please. I think I missed hearing about this.

Also Cinderhulk vs {{item:1011}} 

 Cinderhulk put the {{item:1011}}  Giant Belt into a very under position, I think so that the {{item:1011}}  need a cost reduction to 950g to no be overshadow. IMO
